title: The possible causes not connecting to other Bluetooth
answer:
Phone support the profile A2DP,HSP,HFP,PAN,HIDH,OPP,PBAP etc; if make sure the   

connecting equipment support these profile but cannot be connected either, please refer to   

the following cases:   

Not searching the other phone   

Method: if the other phone Bluetooth is open, and under the searchable state   

Not searching the other Bluetooth earphone   

Method: be sure earphone is under searchable state, related settings refer to the manual of   

earphone   

Not connecting to the other phone while sending files   

Method: be sure whether the other phone support receiving files or receiving this kind of files
